item.title: Experience
item.description: WORK EXPERIENCE Full Stack Developer - Teradici HP, Burnaby, Canada January 2019 - Present Developing Node microservices and managing a Kubernetes cluster Handling operations including monitoring services and infrastructure Using a diverse set of languages (Go, Javascript, Python, Terraform) Co-Founder and Lead Developer - ALU Interactive, Winnipeg, Canada April 2018 - December 2018 Designed, developed, tested, and launched the game All For One into early access
